tool_description: Characteristics and details of a location such as pincode, urban/ rural classification and more.
name: Address details
title: Address details

api_list.name: /get_pincode
api_list.description: Get the pincode of a location.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://address-details.p.rapidapi.com/get_pincode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "address-details.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /get_location_details
api_list.description: Get the state, district, city, locality and pincode of a given location.

api_list.name: /is_urban
api_list.description: Location can be given as lat + lng, geohash, h3 index or an address. API response component 'is_urban' returns true if is an urban area and false if its not.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://address-details.p.rapidapi.com/is_urban"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "address-details.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
